author: chirino
msg: Fixed up flow control for the Stomp protocol

author: mryan3
msg: Patch to add the ability to specify a target host for VM placement.
This also includes the ability to specify whether the scheduler should fail to place the VM if the target host is full.

author: mryan3
msg: This patch adds support for dynamically attaching a CDROM ISO to a Qemu-based VM.
Perhaps in the future a more generic call to attach block-devices could be added.
